meanings.definition: A substance that increases sensitivity or responsiveness to stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The sensitizer made the skin more sensitive to sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The photographer used a sensitizer to enhance the image.
meanings.sent3: The sensitizer decided to make the alarm clock extra loud for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as a sensitizer, making everyone more compassionate.
meanings.sent5: Adding the sensitizer to the solution made the reaction much quicker.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that sensitizes.
meanings.sent1: The new sensitizer in the lab was responsible for training the team on safety procedures.
meanings.sent2: The sensitizer, a skilled teacher, helped students understand complex concepts.
meanings.sent3: The sensitizer, a playful puppy, always made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her mentor was a sensitizer, guiding her through difficult situations.
meanings.sent5: The sensitizer, a motivational speaker, inspired the audience with powerful words.
